name: Dogmeleon Demo
description:
The basic concept for this game was dreamt of August, 2021. We liked the idea of a platformer where the character periodically shifts into the background so that the player cannot see where they are momentarily. 

In addition to the tropes of a standard platformer, this puzzle game challenges the player to choose ideal locations to allow the camouflage to trigger! 

To complete the level the player must camouflage in the correct location then use their character as the puzzle piece to complete the suggested pattern. 

Any and all feedback would be greatly appreciated in the comments below or via email at coadventurestudios@gmail.com. Any donation will be used to purchase software licenses or artwork to improve the quality of the game.

Future Updates: Animations, visually appealing UI, and of course more levels!

Thank you!
